j = int(raw_input())
while (j > 0):
    m = map(int,raw_input().split(' '))
    l = []
    while (m[0] > 0):
        l.append(map(int,raw_input().split(' ')))
        m[0] = m[0] - 1
    while (m[1] > 0):
        i = int(raw_input())
        q = 1
        for k in range(len(l)):
            if (l[k][0] <= i and l[k][1] >= i):
                q = 0
                break
        if (q == 0):
            print "NO"
        else:
            print "YES"
        m[1] = m[1]-1
    j = j-1
